name: Cephalic Carnage
description:
'''Cephalic Carnage''' is an American [[death metal]] band formed in [[Denver, Colorado]] in 1992. The band consists vocalist Leonard Leal, guitarists Steve Goldberg and Brian Hopp, drummer John Merryman and bassist Nick Schendzielos. Cephalic Carnage has released six studio albums and toured in North America, Europe and Japan.

Cephalic Carnage play a technically proficient deathgrind style, as well as prolifically experimenting with other genres and incorporating songs of joke nature into their albums, such as parodies of [[black metal]] or [[metalcore]]. They refer to themselves as "rocky mountain hydro [[grindcore|grind]]".
